data.eml:eml: New species of Oropezella Collin (Diptera, Hybotidae, Ocydromiinae) from Brazil and Costa Rica, with comments on the relationships among species-groups

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ale-Rocha, Rosaly, Freitas-Silva, Rafael Augusto Pinheiro De (2014): New species of Oropezella Collin (Diptera, Hybotidae, Ocydromiinae) from Brazil and Costa Rica, with comments on the relationships among species-groups. Zootaxa 3852 (5): 501-539, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.5.1
